TEXT.English: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]%s1 refuses to talk.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]%s1 refuse de vous parler.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]%s1 ist nicht gesprächsbereit.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]%s1 se niega a hablar.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]%s1 refuses to talk.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1 is willing to negotiate.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.German: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1 ist bereit zu verhandeln.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1 está dispuesto a negociar.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1 is willing to negotiate.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]You are the worst enemy of %s1.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]You are the worst enemy of %s1.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YIELD_COMMERCE]%s1 has %d2 gold available for trade.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YIELD_COMMERCE]%s1 a %d2 pièces d'or disponible pour le commerce.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YIELD_COMMERCE]%s1 hat %d2 Gold zum Handeln.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_YIELD_COMMERCE]%s1 has %d2 gold available for trade.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.French: [COLOR_YIELD_COMMERCE]%s1 a %d2 pièces d'or par tour disponible pour le commerce.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YIELD_COMMERCE]%s1 hat %d2 Gold pro Runde zum Handeln.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 will grow to size %d2 on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]La population de %s1 atteindra la taille de %d2 au prochain tour.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]Die Bevölkerung von %s1 wächst nächste Runde auf %d2 an.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 crescerà a grandezza %d2 al prossimo turno.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 alcanzará tamaño %d2 el próximo turno.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 will grow to size %d2 on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 will shrink to size %d2 on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]La population de %s1 verra sa taille réduite à %d2 au prochain tour.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Die Bevölkerung von %s1 schrumpft nächste Runde auf %d2.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 si ridurrà a grandezza %d2 al prossimo turno.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 se reducirá a tamaño %d2 el próximo turno.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 will shrink to size %d2 on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 deviendra insalubre au prochain tour.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Die Bevölkerung von %s1 wird nächste Runde krank.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 se volverá insalubre el próximo turno.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 will become unhealthy on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.French: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Les conditions sanitaires de %s1 deviendront bonnes au prochain tour.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Die Bevölkerung von %s1 wird nächste Runde gesund.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]%s1 se volverá salubre el próximo turno [COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1 will become healthy on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 will become unhappy on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Die Bevölkerung von %s1 wird nächste Runde unzufrieden.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 se volverá infeliz el próximo turno.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 will become unhappy on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1 will become happy on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]La population de %s1 deviendra satisfaite au prochain tour.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Die Bevölkerung von %s1 wird nächste Runde zufrieden.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]%s1 se volverá feliz el próximo turno [COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1 will become happy on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 est devenue insalubre.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Die Bevölkerung von %s1 ist krank![COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 has become unhealthy.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1 has become healthy.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Les conditions sanitaires de %s1 sont devenues bonnes.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Die Bevölkerung von %s1 ist gesund![COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]%s1 se ha vuelto salubre [COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1 has become healthy.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Die Bevölkerung von %s1 ist unzufrieden![COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 se ha vuelto infeliz.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.German: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Die Bevölkerung von %s1 ist zufrieden![COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]%s1 se ha vuelto feliz [COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1 has become happy.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.French: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]La population de %s1 a augmenté jusqu'à la taille %d2.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]Die Bevölkerung von %s1 ist auf %d2 gewachsen![COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 ha alcanzado tamaño %d2.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 has grown to size %d2.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 has shrunk to size %d2.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1 will be pacified on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]La population de %s1 sera apaisée au prochain tour.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Die Unruhen in %s1 werden nächste Runde enden.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1 será pacificado en el próximo turno.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1 will be pacified on the next turn.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1 has been pacified.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]La population de %s1 est apaisée.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Die Unruhen in %s1 sind beendet![COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Ha sido pacificado %s1.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1 has been pacified.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 can hurry %s2 for %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] with %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION] overflow and +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] for %d5 turns.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 peut accélérer la construction de %s2 avec pour conséquences %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP], %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION] en surplus et +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] pendant %d5 tours.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 kann das Bauprojekt "%s2" unter Einsatz von %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] beschleunigen (Überschuss: %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION]), wobei für %d5 Runden +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] in der Stadt verursacht wird.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 può accelerare %s2 per %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] con un surplus di %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION] e +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] per %d5 [NUM5:turno:turni].[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 puede acelerar %s2 por %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] con exceso de %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION] y +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] durante %d5 turnos.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 can hurry %s2 for %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] with %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION] overflow and +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] for %d5 turns.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 can hurry %s2 for %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] with %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION] overflow, %d6[ICON_GOLD] added to the treasury, and +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] for %d5 turns.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 peut accélérer la construction de %s2 avec pour conséquences %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP], %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION] en surplus, %d6[ICON_GOLD] ajouté au trésor, et +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] pendant %d5 tours.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 kann das Bauprojekt "%s2" unter Einsatz von %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] beschleunigen (Überschuss: %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION] + %d6[ICON_GOLD] für die Staatskasse), wobei für %d5 Runden +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] in der Stadt verursacht wird.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 può accelerare %s2 per %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] con un surplus di %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION], un aumento del tesoro di %d6[ICON_GOLD] e +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] per %d5 [NUM5:turno:turni].[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 puede acelerar %s2 por %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] con exceso de %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION], %d6[ICON_GOLD] añadido al tesoro, y +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] durante %d5 turnos.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 can hurry %s2 for %d3[ICON_ANGRYPOP] with %d4[ICON_PRODUCTION] overflow, %d6[ICON_GOLD] added to the treasury, and +1[ICON_UNHAPPY] for %d5 turns.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 can hurry %s2 for %d3[ICON_GOLD].[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 peut accélérer la production de %s2 pour %d3[ICON_GOLD].[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 kann das Bauprojekt "%s2" unter Einsatz von %d3[ICON_GOLD] beschleunigen.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 puede acelerar %s2 por %d3[ICON_GOLD].[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 can hurry %s2 for %d3[ICON_GOLD].[COLOR_REVERT]
